snippet.title: Ilysia | Alpha 2 Launch Date Announcement
snippet.description:
Embers rise beneath obsidian, etched across the scarred wasteland. Will you traverse the lands to discover its mystery? Or fall to the creatures that lurk between the flames? 

The wait is nearly over! Team 21 Studio is proud to bring you the date announcement trailer for Ilysia's second alpha testing phase!

For this Alpha, players that have access will get the opportunity to complete the questline or spend their time exploring the world to find points of interest and some of Ilysia's hidden secrets. There are plenty of things to discover in the world and we cannot wait to see what you find!


For future news and updates be sure to follow us on our socials and check out https://ilysiavr.com/

#VR #VRMMO #IndieDev 

------------------------------------------------------

Discord: https://discord.gg/ilysia/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/ilysiavr/
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1154120/Ilysia/
